Voorganger: Nokia 8 Sirocco, Nokia Lumia 1020 & Lumia Mclaren (spiritueel)
Dimensions: H: 155 mm (6.1 duim), W: 75 mm (3.0 duim), D: 8 mm (0. 31 duim)
Sve: Octa- core (4x2.8 GHz Kryo 385 Goud & 4x1.7 GHz Kryo 385 Swart)
Vertoon: 5. 99 in (15.2 cm) 1440 x 2880 QHD P- OLED, Gorilla Glass 5
Agterste kamera: 5x Wyd (2x Rgb + 3x monochrome) 12 MP, f / 1.8, 1.4 μm, 28mm, 1/2. 9 + ToF sensor, Dubbel- skakering fliss
Verbinding: LTE Cat16 1024 Mbps DL / Cat13 150 Mbps UL, Wi- Fi (802.11 a/b/g/n/ac MIMO), GPS, A- GPS, GLONASS, BDS, Galileo, ANT+, NFC, USB 3.1 Type- C
Ander: IP67 water weerstand, Qi draagbare oplaai
